subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Knicks, known for their 3-pointers, made 27 of 35 free throw attempts in their victory over the 76ers on Sunday. Carmelo Anthony was 16 of 18 in free throws.
snippet: The Knicks, known for their 3-pointers, made 27 of 35 free throw attempts in their victory over the 76ers on Sunday. Carmelo Anthony was 16 of 18 in free throws.
